metadata.description: Young Aiden Cross has the typical American suburban life - he complains about school, has crushes on the popular girls and hates going to bed at a reasonable hour. Everything changes when Aiden discovers that he isn't even a human being, but a powerful android who has to save his city from a variety of astonishing and deadly monsters. With each battle, Aiden becomes stronger, inherits new abilities and gets named "ROBOY" because of his appearance - but his greatest challenge will come when he confronts the dark truth about his mysterious origin. Written and drawn in the style of classic CAPCOM arcade games, Roboy is the bridge between the worlds of gaming and comic books!
metadata.name: Roboy
